body:
Thanks for the feedback! If your issue is related to the Flutter framework itself,
please open an issue at
[github.com/flutter/flutter](https://github.com/flutter/flutter/issues/new).

## Steps to Reproduce

_Error while installing Kotlin update_

## Version info

```

[√] Android toolchain - develop for Android devices (Android SDK version 29.0.2)

    • ANDROID_HOME = C:\Users\pulst\AppData\Local\Android\Sdk
    • Java binary at: C:\Program Files\Android Studio\jre\bin\java
    • Java version OpenJDK Runtime Environment (build 1.8.0_242-release-1644-b01)
    • All Android licenses accepted.

[√] Chrome - develop for the web

       https://plugins.jetbrains.com/plugin/6351-dart

[√] Connected device (5 available)
    • Vivo XI (mobile)  • PRUCHYWGG6HYSK4H • android-arm64  • Android 9 (API 28)
    • Windows (desktop) • windows          • windows-x64    • Microsoft Windows [versÃ£o 10.0.18363.1379]
    • Web Server (web)  • web-server       • web-javascript • Flutter Tools

    • Edge (web)        • edge             • web-javascript • Microsoft Edge 88.0.705.62

## What happened

The error ocurred while installing Kotlin update.

## Version information

Android Studio `4.1.2` • Flutter plugin `io.flutter 53.1.1` • Dart plugin `201.9317`

Error getting Flutter sdk information.

## Exception

null

```
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at com.intellij.ui.content.impl.ContentManagerImpl.doAddContent(ContentManagerImpl.java:175)
	at com.intellij.ui.content.impl.ContentManagerImpl.addContent(ContentManagerImpl.java:159)

comment_data.body: I believe this was fixed in #5261 and will be in the next release. Maybe @helin24 can confirm and close.

title: Error while updating Kotlin
